value: projects : Display the list of my personal projects

rows: Validation testing of software and firmwares of tightenings tools used in industrial fields such as aeronautics and automative.
Testing of the real time part of UTAH project involving the revamp of the AAA system (authentication, authorization, accounting) for Internet boxes to handle RADIUS and DHCP protocols.

Testing of new features and fixes across three scopes: EIFFEL (service monitoring and supervision), API Confort (crowd estimation and display), and ALMA (audio broadcasting and information display at stations).
Testing new features and improvements added to Orange’s mobile billing payment services for Internet, mobile, and xMS transactions.
Testing new features added to the service platforms within the context of TV broadcasting managed by Bouygues Telecom.

Ensured the coordination of translation and testing teams. Our goal was to provide high quality localised assets of game franchises (game text, scripts for audio recording, marketing assets). Our main clients were Nintendo, Microsoft, Square Enix, Codemasters or Blizzard.

Coordination of the testing teams : English, French, Italian, German and Spanish. Our goal was to check the quality of localised assets of games. Translations were done by our in-house translation teams.
Ensure the quality of localization/translation for franchises published by Nintendo of Europe. Bug reporting and management of French team.
Diplôme d'Ingénieur-Maître Génie Électrique et Informatique Industrielle
DUT Génie Électrique et Informatique Industrielle
I set up a private web page where I can manually change data from my resume via a form. After validating changes, this will generate a PDF file that will be available on the public link.
Web application to quickly find aeronautical maps. A C# version already existed but I preferred to update it with a web version which is easier to use.

Personal website allowing me to show my projects and deploy a new version of the software.

Software to quickly retrieve aeronautical charts.
